item.title: 12. A Fitness Manual for Random Walkers and Other Investors
item.description: Exercise 1: Have a regular savings program. Start investing early because compound interest and time are you greatest resource. When it comes to setting saving accounts' interest rates with regard to the interest rate that banks enjoy from the fed , banks are downwards-flexible and upwards-sticky.
